```{r}
head(penguins)
```

Creating ggplot
Scatter plot of body mass versus flipper length
changes size depending on species if added in geom point size = species
```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g, y = flipper_length_mm)) + geom_point(aes(color = species), size = 4)
```
